cm3038.lab03.sq8solution

Class Sq8State

  • java.lang.Object
    • cm3038.lab03.sq8solution.Sq8State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class Sq8State
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    This class models the state of the 8-Puzzle problem.
    Author:
    Kit-ying Hui

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        The hashCode() method is needed as we use a HashSet to store the history of visited nodes. It returns an int value for a Sq8State object. The only requirement is that if 2 objects are equal, their hash code should be the same. This method has been implemented for you. In this implementation, I use the simple formula of: square1+square2*2+square3*3+...+square9*9
        Specified by:
        hashCode in interface State
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The hash code of the State object.
